mapper.select: select a.id, a.order_date as orderDate, b.id as "customer.id", b.name as "customer.name", b.address as "customer.address" from orders a inner join customer b on a.customer_id=b.id
select id, name, author from orders__books a inner join books b on a.book_id = b.id where a.order_id= #{id}
